Title: Antiques Roadshow
Notes: St. George 's Hall has been used as a location on several occasions

Title: Between the Lines
Notes: The episode Lest Ye Be Judged was set in and around Liverpool and New Brighton

Title: Boys
Notes: Channel 4 drama set in the 1980s staring Keeley Hawes , Stephen Fry & Neil Patrick Harris . The Pier Head doubled for New York

Title: Boys from the Blackstuff
Notes: Five episodes running from 10 October to 7 November 1982

Title: Bread
Notes: Filmed in and around the Dingle area of the city

Title: Broadchurch
Notes: ITV drama , scenes for series 3 were filmed at the Liverpool docks

Title: Broken
Notes: BBC Jimmy McGovern drama starring Sean Bean and Anna Friel

Title: Brookside
Notes: Channel 4 soap opera set in a fictional Liverpool street

Title: Bulletproof
Notes: Sky drama , filmed in County Sessions House as well as several streets around Liverpool and the Birkenhead tunnel

Title: The Bullion Boys
Notes: Television drama based on the true story of how Britain 's gold reserves were moved to Liverpool during the Second World War

Title: Casualty
Notes: Used Liverpool Lime Street station and various locations in Anfield for an episode in Series 26 of the long-running series , which is usually filmed in Cardiff

Title: The City & the City
Notes: Used Liverpool Town Hall , Old Hall Street , Cotton Exchange , County Sessions House and Martins Bank Building

Title: The Crown
Notes: Netflix historical drama based on the life of Queen Elizabeth II . Liverpool doubled for 1960s Washington DC with the Cunard Building , Royal Liver Building and North John Street being used

Title: Close to the Enemy
Notes: Martins Bank Building , the Adelphi , Croxteth Hall and the docks were all used for post-WW2 Britain

Title: Curfew
Notes: Water Street , Rumford Street and Formby Beach were used in for the filming of the Sky One / NOW TV drama

Title: Das Boot
Notes: German TV series based on the Lothar-Gunther Buchheim novel . The Cunard Building and Water Street were turned into 1940s New York and the sandhills in Sefton were used for the US state of Maine

Title: Desperate Scousewives
Notes: Structured reality television series following the next generation of Liverpudlians determined to show the UK just what they 're all about

Title: The English Game
Notes: A six-part Netflix drama created by Downton Abbey creator Julian Fellowes , charting the origins and development of football

Title: The Feed
Notes: Liverpool doubled as London for exterior filming for the Amazon Prime drama , with shooting taking place around the Pier Head
